summary: The National Football Conference  is one of the two conferences of the National Football League , the other being the American Football Conference.
full_text: The National Football Conference  is one of the two conferences of the National Football League , the highest professional level of American football in the United States. This conference and its counterpart, the American Football Conference , currently contain 16 teams each, making up the 32 teams of the NFL. The current NFC title holder is the Seattle Seahawks.
title: National Football Conference
